snippet: Lacey Spears, 26, was arrested in the death of her son Garnett, whom investigators say she intentionally made sick for years and chronicled his illnesses on social media.
abstract: Lacey Spears is arrested in death of her son Garnett and charged with fatally poisoning him with overdose of sodium in Westchester County; investigators say she intentionally made him sick for years and chronicled his illnesses on social media and her popular parenting blog; she is believed to have Munchausen syndrome by proxy, rare mental illness that leads parents to cause or invent health symptoms for attention.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Lacey Spears, 26, was arrested in the death of her son Garnett, whom investigators say she intentionally made sick for years and chronicled his illnesses on social media.

headline.seo: Lacey Spears Is Accused of Intentionally Giving Her Son High Levels of Sodium
headline.main: Mother Charged With Fatal Poisoning of 5-Year-Old Boy
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged in Fatal Poisoning of Her Son, 5
